title: Somethin' about Scandanavia: as told by a Danish boy
creator_credit: Bent Barfod and Government Film Committee of Denmark
brief_description: This animated film gives a lighthearted resume of Norway, Sweden, Denmark and Iceland; their history and geography, main products, standard of living and dependence upon trade and co-operation for prosperity. Based on an idea by Carl T. Dreyer. Animation by Berge Hamberg.
